entry.title: J3 Dual Port - Qualcomm 3.0 + 2.4 USB Quick Car Charger
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rockstone
Type: Car Charger
Price: 12.99

  • J3 Dual Port Car charger provides fast car charging than conventional charging
  • This unit is universally compatible with dual port charging
  • J3 Amp car charger is powered by Smart Charging Technology that identifies devices their unique charging requirements.
  • Get upto 80% charge in less than 30 minutes
  • The first port is 2.4 USB, 12W Output Charging Port
  • The second port is Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 that charges 4 times faster than the conventional charger.

Package Includes : J3 Dual Port Qualcomm 3.0 + 2.4 USB Quick Car Charger

entry.title: Bullet 2 Port 4.8 Amp Universal USB Car Charger
entry.summary:
Vendor: Caseco
Type: Car Charger
Price: 7.99

  • Caseco Bullet 2 Port Car Charger provides fast charging than conventional charging
  • This unit is universally compatible with dual port charging
  • Caseco Bullet 2 Port Car Charger is powered by Smart Charging Technology that identifies devices their unique charging requirements.
  • This unit can be used with Android devices and other USB Portable Devices
  • Input: DC 12-24V | Output: DC 5V (4.8 AMP), 2.4 amp per output
  • Provides of built-in LED indicator for Charging indication.
Package Includes : Caseco Bullet 2 Port Car Charger

entry.title: Revive HC2 USB Wall and Car Charging Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Scosche
Type: Car Charger
Price: 12.99

Scosche's REVIVE HC2 charger kit will keep your iPhone, iPad, or other USB device charged up anywhere — at home or on the go. Compatible with most USB devices, the kit includes a home power adapter and DC power adapter capable of charging at 12W (2.4A).
USB Car Charger
The car charger allows you to charge devices at 12 Watts (2.4A) of power.
REVIVE includes an ultra low-profile design that fits flush in most vehicle power sockets - ensuring the best use of valuable space around your dashboard.
USB Wall Charger
The home charger allows you to charge devices at 12 Watts (2.4A) of power.
REVIVE includes an ultra low-profile design that won't block addition power outlets - allowing you to use other appliances or chargers in the same wall outlet.
Works with: iPod, iPhone, iPad, Android Devices, Smartphones, BlackBerry, MP3 Players, Gaming devices and more.
